trustfund: TF020250-FRENCH CONSULTANTS TRUST FUND,TF033182-ALBANIA - AGRICULTURAL RURAL CREDIT,TF032881-ALBANIA - AGRICULTURE,TF031290-ALBANIA - AGRICULTURE RURAL CREDIT,TF025075-AGRICULTURE SECTOR ADJUSTMENT

abstracts.cdata!:
The credit is designed to:  (a) support
            a sectoral program of radical structural reforms over a
            period of 18 months; (b) provide a line of credit to the
            government for onlending to rural entrepreneurs through the
            new Agricultural Bank; and (c) provide funds for technical
            assistance to support the implementation of the program.
            The sectoral reform program is based on the strategic
            framework developed by the government in collaboration with
            IDA and the European Community.  It addresses four key areas
            of policy and institutional reform:  (a) creating an
            appropriate agricultural price and incentive framework; (b)
            provide rural entrepreneurs with access to credit and
            restructuring of the rural financial system; (c) liquidate
            state farms, distribute their land and develop the legal and
            policy framework in order to accelerate consolidation and
            develop the market for land; and (d) improve the performance
            of the (currently state-owned) enterprises in the
            agricultural marketing and processing sector.
